section.name: Contact
section.p: The SPOCS eDelivery concept as well as the implementation was foremost lead and provided by bremen online services GmbH & KG (bos), Bremen, Germany.

The responsible contacts from bos are Jörg Apitzsch [solution design, architecture and specification details, technical questions] (ja@bos-bremen.de) and Lars Thölken [organisational, solution design, general questions] (lt@bos-bremen.de).
